item.title: You Won't Believe What Google Just Did to Their Shared Drive Limits!
item.description: Introduction Google recently announced a significant change to their shared drive limits. This update will increase the amount of storage space available to users, while also introducing better organization and collaboration tools. In this blog post, we’ll take a look at the details of the change, the benefits it provides, and the potential drawbacks. Overview of Google’s New Shared Drive Limits Google’s new shared drive limits will increase the storage space available to users from 5TB to 100TB.
